title: Honeymoon Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Honeymoon Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Laird's Bonded Apple Brandy
1/2
ounce
Marie Brizard Orange Curaçao
1/2
ounce
Bénédictine
1/2
ounce
fresh lemon juice
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, add apple brandy, curacao, Benedictine, and lemon juice. Shake well and strain into a chilled coupe.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Brandy & Cognac
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
